name: Sigurd
description:
Legend tells us of 'Gram' the sword given to man by Odin himself. Follow Sigurd on his quest to collect the fragments of the sword... and his past.

Notes

Not even nearly finished. A month is a tough challenge for an RPG! When I've recovered from the last few days, I'm going to continue developing this project over the next few months.

I learned a lot about RPG Maker during this challenge, and a lot about myself.

One of the things I really struggled with was the soundtrack... I knew I wanted to steer clear of chiptunes, even though that would go with the artstyle. One afternoon it came to me,- to go analogue/acoustic recorded to cassette tape. Please give it a listen if anything as I'm really proud of how it turned out.

Love + Light x
